Conjunction performed on a Bit String, Bit by Bit.

Computer Representation of Sets

DM
May 23, 2020

We assume Universal Set to be finite (bounded by Memory limits of system).

Intersection of Collection of Sets

DM
May 22, 2020

Set Intersection of a collection of sets will contains elements which are present in all sets.

Set Intersection

DM
May 21, 2020

Intersection of two Sets $A$ and $B$ is the set that contains elements common in both sets.

Union of Collection of Sets

DM
May 20, 2020

Set Union of a collection of sets will contains elements which are present in at least one of the set.

Set Union

DM
May 19, 2020

Union of two Sets $A$ and $B$ is the set that contains elements from both sets.
